features.header: Frank Ocean songs that are never getting any boring
features.content: Frank Ocean released a new album this year, but I still feel the need to constantly go back to some of his older songs. Here's a list of some of Frank Ocean's classics.

features.header: My favorite live rap performance of all time
features.content: Live rap performances can often be more enjoyable than studio versions of songs. Here's a short compilation of some of my favorite live hip-hop performances ever.
